text: Damián Alcázar (born January 8, 1953) is a Mexican actor and politician. He is known for playing Lord Sopespian in The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian, Gilberto Rodríguez Orejuela in the Netflix series Narcos and Alberto Reyes in Blue Beetle. Alcázar was a deputy in the Constituent Assembly of Mexico City from the MORENA political party, but left office in January 2017 after being absent for three months. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Politicians from Mexico City Category:People from Michoacán Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Damián Alcázar
